vulnerabilities.title: mongo-express Cross-site Request Forgery vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: In mongo-express 1.0.2, /admin allows CSRF, as demonstrated by deletion of a Collection.

vulnerabilities.title: Denial of Service (DoS) in mongo-express
vulnerabilities.description: All versions of package mongo-express are vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) when exporting an empty collection as CSV, due to an unhandled exception, leading to a crash.

vulnerabilities.title: Cross-site scripting
vulnerabilities.description:
Two kinds of XSS were found:

1.  As mentioned in https://github.com/mongo-express/mongo-express/issues/577 when the content of a cell grows larger than supported size, clicking on a row will show full document unescaped, however this needs admin interaction on cell.
2. Data cells identified as media will be rendered as media, without being sanitized. Example of different renders: image, audio, video, etc.



### Impact
As an example of type 1 attack, an unauthorized user who only can send a lar
